info.name: ACI - Single Pod Setup v1.5a
info.description:
PLEASE CLONE THIS COLLECTIN BEFORE MODIFYING IT!

1.5a folder rearrangement  
1.4 fixed backup script  
1.3 added backup script  
1.2 fixed RR config (now all 4 spines are RRs)  
1.0 first release

Multipod topology includes:

- 2 spines and 4 leaves with serial numbers for Pod 1.
- 2 spines and 4 leaves with serial numbers for Pod 2.
- 2 IPN nodes for each pod
- full mesh between spins and IPN for each pod
- 4 IPN nodes can implement any type of meshed topology, considering high-availablilty
- ring IPN topology has been validated
    

Multi-Pod Setup Postman Collection, comes "as is" from Cisco Sweden.

REQUIRES SIGNIFICUNT MODIFICATIN BEFORE BEING USED.

body.raw:
<fabricNodeIdentPol>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO2643036N" name="SP911" nodeId="911" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO2643034H" name="SP912" nodeId="912" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO270405SP" name="LF101" nodeId="101" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO270405PV" name="LF102" nodeId="102" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO270405T2" name="LF103" nodeId="103" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO270405UQ" name="LF104" nodeId="104" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO2735147E" name="LF105" nodeId="105" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO27350XKG" name="LF106" nodeId="106" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO2735144N" name="LF107" nodeId="107" podId="1"/>
    <fabricNodeIdentP serial="FDO2733514GF" name="LF108" nodeId="108" podId="1"/>
</fabricNodeIdentPol>

<fvTenant descr="" dn="uni/tn-mgmt" name="mgmt">
    <mgmtMgmtP descr="" name="default">
    <mgmtOoB descr="" name="default">
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.101/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-101"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.102/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-102"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.103/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-103"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.104/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-104"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.105/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-105"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.106/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-106"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.107/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-107"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.108/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-108"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.91/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-911"/>
      <mgmtRsOoBStNode addr="172.31.255.92/24" gw="172.31.255.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-912"/>
    </mgmtOoB>
  </mgmtMgmtP>
</fvTenant>

<fvTenant dn="uni/tn-mgmt" name="mgmt">
    <mgmtMgmtP name="default">
      <mgmtInB name="EPG-INBAND-MGMT">
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.11/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.12/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-2"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.13/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-3"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.101/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-101"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.102/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-102"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.103/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-103"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.104/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-104"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.91/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-911"/>
        <mgmtRsInBStNode addr="10.60.0.92/24" gw="10.60.0.1" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-912"/>
    </mgmtInB>
  </mgmtMgmtP>
</fvTenant>

<fabricInst>
<!-- Pod Policies  -->
    <!-- Timezone  -->
    <datetimeFormat dn="uni/fabric/format-default" tz="p120_Europe-Stockholm"/>
  <!-- NTP Server -->
  <datetimePol dn="uni/fabric/time-PPO-NTP">
    <datetimeNtpProv name="172.31.255.1" descr="NTP Server 1" preferred="true">
        <datetimeRsNtpProvToEpg tDn="uni/tn-mgmt/mgmtp-default/oob-default"/>
    </datetimeNtpProv>
  </datetimePol>
  
  <!-- BGP Route Reflector -->
  <bgpInstPol name='default'>
      <!--  BGP AS Number  -->
        <bgpAsP name='aspn' asn='65432'/>
         <!--  External RR Nodes  -->
            <bgpRRP name='route-reflector'>
                <bgpRRNodePEp id='911'/>
                <bgpRRNodePEp id='912'/>
             </bgpRRP>
    </bgpInstPol>
    
<!-- Policy Group -->    
  <fabricFuncP>
    <fabricPodPGrp name="PPG-SINGLEPOD">
      <fabricRsTimePol tnDatetimePolName="PPO-NTP"/>
      <fabricRsSnmpPol tnSnmpPolName="default"/>
      <fabricRsPodPGrpBGPRRP tnBgpInstPolName="default"/>
      <fabricRsPodPGrpIsisDomP tnIsisDomPolName="default"/>
      <fabricRsPodPGrpCoopP tnCoopPolName="default"/>
      <fabricRsCommPol tnCommPolName="default"/>
    </fabricPodPGrp>
  </fabricFuncP>

<!-- Apply Pod Profile --> 
  <fabricPodP name="default">
    <fabricPodS name="default" type="ALL">
      <fabricRsPodPGrp tDn="uni/fabric/funcprof/podpgrp-PPG-SINGLEPOD"/>
    </fabricPodS>
  </fabricPodP>
</fabricInst>

<fabricOOServicePol>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-101" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-102" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-103" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-104" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-911" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-912" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
</fabricOOServicePol>

<!-- Feasible node IDs 
    101,102,103,104,911,912
-->
<fabricOOServicePol>
    <fabricRsDecommissionNode tDn="topology/pod-1/node-101" status="created,modified" removeFromController="true"/>
</fabricOOServicePol>

<polUni>
    <fabricInst>
   
    <fileRemotePath host="10.52.230.63" name="CPOC-Z_Backups" protocol="ftp" remotePath="/FTP-TFTP/APIC-Backups/i08-fabric-01/" remotePort="21" userName="anonymous" userPasswd="mypass@me.com" descr="in Z drive in FTP-TFTP/APIC-Backups/i08-fabric-01/folder">
        <fileRsARemoteHostToEpg tDn="uni/tn-mgmt/mgmtp-default/oob-default">
        </fileRsARemoteHostToEpg>
    </fileRemotePath>
    
    <trigSchedP name="Daliy-CPOC">
        <trigRecurrWindowP name="Daily" hour="2"></trigRecurrWindowP>
    </trigSchedP>
    
    <configExportP name="DailyToExteral" descr="save backups on Z drive" adminSt="triggered">
        
        <configRsExportScheduler tnTrigSchedPName="Daliy-CPOC">
        </configRsExportScheduler>
        
        <configRsRemotePath tnFileRemotePathName="CPOC-Z_Backups">
        </configRsRemotePath>
        
    </configExportP>
    
    </fabricInst>
</polUni>

request.description: Daily backup of fabric to Z drive FTP-TFTP/APIC-backups/i02-fabric-01
